original_text: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;
korean_text: 두아디라 교회의 사자에게 편지하라 그 눈이 불꽃 같고 그 발이 빛난 주석과 같은 하나님의 아들이 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write
These things saith the Son of God
who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire
and his feet are like fine brass
